name: Blitzar
description:
With your trusty spacecraft chart a huge galaxy! One star down, 16383 more to go!

Controls
  • Arrow keys to move your ship.
  • Move to the edge of the screen to fly to another star.
  • Each time you visit a new star, your exploration percentage goes up.
Code q={}s=128x=9y=63pal({-15,1,-13,-4,12},1)b=0v=0j=0k=0g=0h=0e,u,w=srand,circfill,rnd::_::p=btn()j+=(p\2%2-p%2)/4k+=(p\8%2-p\4%2)/4e(t())for i=0,400do n=w(s)m=w(s)circ(n,m,1,abs(pget(n,m)-1))end camera(v,b)v*=.8b*=.8e(r)for i=0,99do n=w(s)m=w(s)pset(n,m,5)end l=0for i=0,w(9)do a=w()+t()/i/9f=i<1and w(3)+9or 1+w(i)u(l*cos(a)+63,l*sin(a)+63-i,f,7)l+=f+w(9)+5end x+=j y+=k if(x<0or x>s)g+=sgn(j)v=s*-sgn(j)x%=s if(y<0or y>s)h+=sgn(k)b=s*-sgn(k)y%=s ?(#q/4^7*100).."%",2,2 r=g+s*h for i in all(q)do if(i==r)goto e end add(q,r)::e::u(x,y,1,7)j*=.9k*=.9flip()goto _
